Package io.sentry.util.network

Class NetworkDetailCaptureUtils

java.lang.Object
io.sentry.util.network.NetworkDetailCaptureUtils
public final class NetworkDetailCaptureUtils extends Object
Utility class for network capture operations shared across HTTP client integrations. Provides common logic for determining what network data to capture and filtering headers.
